tweets: And finally @Actor_Siddharth what Can I say bout you. You are the best .Hats off to all your noble thoughts and deeds. U r an inspiration.
@sujithkumar13 you played a very critical role in taking #ChennaiMicro to the next level. Dunno what I will do witout u. Thank u Sujith.
@archanakalpathi U got #ChennaiMicro all that we wanted and made sure everything reached safe. U organized d impossible things, Thank you.
@AnjanaVJ and @moulistic you guys were a perfect team.U guys reached more ppl than most of us thro ur selfless efforts in #ChennaiMicro
@Chinmayi we can't thank u enough for all d hardwork and initiatives that u did fr #ChenniMicro. U r an integral part of all the good work.
Thank u @VigneshhShivan fr being a pillar of strength in #ChenniMicro . U worked really hard n lead volunteers as a true selfless leader.
Still not able to beleive this nor d unimaginable support and trust in #ChennaiMicro . Humbled. Thank you.
Exactly d sameday last year, Kavya got a heart donor. This year it s #ChennaiMicro. World is beautiful when we stop reacting n start acting.
Guber,muthu,vaithi,kandhan, kamaraj,sabari,saravanan n thousands of thambigal who volunteered r d real heroes.U ppl r d best. Love u all.
